item.title: American Water warns of billing outages after finding hackers in its systems
item.description:
The company said it discovered “unauthorized activity” within its networks on October 3 and promptly moved to disconnect affected systems.

item.title: Kobold Metals, which uses AI to help find critical minerals for the energy transition, raises $491M
item.description:
Kobold Metals has raised $491 million of a targeted $527 million round, which could value the company at over $2 billion.

item.title: Spacecraft launches towards knocked off course asteroid
item.description: The mission aims to re-visit the asteroid Nasa diverted when it crashed a probe into it.

item.title: The best laptops under $500: They may be even cheaper during October Prime Day
item.description: After extensive hands-on testing, these are the best laptops we've found for under $500. Learn about our favorite gaming machines, Chromebooks, and budget picks, and maybe even score a better bargain during Prime Big Deal Days.
